responses: Hi there, welcome to KJSIEIT website
Hello, how can I help you?
See you later, thanks for visiting

patterns: What kinds of branches are there?
What branches I can take admission in?
responses: We have Computer, IT, EXTC, ETRX and AIDS branches
One can take admission in Computer, IT, EXTC, ETRX and AIDS branches
We accept VISA, Demand Drafts, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, Demand Drafts and Paypal

patterns: Can I get the college address?
responses: The college location is Somaiya Ayurvihar Complex Eastern Express Highway Near Everard Nagar, Sion East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400022
You can visit the college by following the address Somaiya Ayurvihar Complex Eastern Express Highway Near Everard Nagar, Sion East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400022

patterns: what courses can I take admission to?
What kinds of courses are there?
responses: We offer various Under graduate and Post graduate courses.
One can take admission to one of the Under graduate and Post graduate courses

patterns: what amount am I expected to pay for fees?
responses: The fees ranges from 1.5 to 1.8 Lacs for Under graduate and 1.8 to 2 Lacs for Post graduate courses
The Undergraduate courses cost from 1.5 to 1.8 Lacs and Post graduate courses cost from 1.8 to 2 Lacs
